About me

Hi, I’m Adrian and I’m a web developer with over 6 years of experience. I’m into sports, I like running and basketball, and when I’m (rarely) away from my computer I love to spend time with my daughter and my wife. Find out more about me/my work on LinkedIn, Twitter, and GitHub.

Oh, and I really love JavaScript, Vim, HTML and the Open Web!
